Summary: I took 4 pictures of a rainbow around the sun, later discovered the UFO in all four pictures and different locations.
divs: Sighting DetailsI was getting into my car, one foot in when I got the message in my mind I needed to look up to the sky. I instantly saw a perfectly formed rainbow in a circle around the sun! It was incredible and I couldn't beleive how beautiful it was. No one else is around to see this as I took four pictures from different angles within a one minute time frame. I have had many profound rainbow experiences and thought this was just one more event to remember. About 5 minutes after I took these pictures a woman came out of a store and I had to point out the spectacle and share my find. I drove home and later looked at the photos only to find it was also another UFO event as well! I immediately looked online to see if anyone else had seen this event, all I could find was a man in China witnessed the rainbow around the sun only.
trends: There have been 28 other sightings in Asheville
There were no other sightings in Asheville on or around September 2nd 2012
